00020 #include "tool.hh"
00021 #include <BRepPrimAPI_MakeRevol.hxx>
00022 #include <BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge.hxx>
00023 #include <BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire.hxx>
00024 #include <BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace.hxx>
00025 #include <Handle_Geom_TrimmedCurve.hxx>
00026 #include <GC_MakeArcOfCircle.hxx>
00027 #include <TopoDS.hxx>
00028 #include <TopoDS_Edge.hxx>
00029 #include <TopoDS_Wire.hxx>
00030 //tool.cc - functions in classes tool, millTool, etc
00031 
00032 tool::tool() {
00033   //isRotaryTool = false;
00034   valid = false;
00035   profile.Nullify();
00036   type = UNDEFINED;
00037 }
00038 
00039 millTool::millTool() {
00040   shape = UNDEF;
00041   type = ROTARY_TOOL;
00042   d=0.0;
00043   l=0.0;
00044   revol.Nullify();
00045   isRotaryTool = true;
00046 }
00047 
00048 const TopoDS_Solid millTool::getRevol() {
00049   if (revol.IsNull()) {
00050     gp_Ax1 vertical(gp_Pnt(0,0,0),gp_Dir(0,0,1));
00051     BRepPrimAPI_MakeRevol rev(profile,vertical,M_PI,true);
00052     valid = rev.IsDone();
00053     if (valid)
00054       revol = TopoDS::Solid( rev.Shape() );
00055   }
00056   return revol;
00057 }
00058 
00059 //aptTool::aptTool() {}
00060 
00061 ballnoseTool::ballnoseTool(double diameter, double length) {
00062   double r = diameter/2.0;
00063   valid = false;
00064   Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) Tc;
00065   Tc = GC_MakeArcOfCircle (gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(0,0,0), gp_Pnt(-r,0,r));
00066   TopoDS_Edge Ec = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(Tc);
00067   TopoDS_Edge E1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(r,0,length));
00068   TopoDS_Edge E2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,r), gp_Pnt(-r,0,length));
00069   TopoDS_Edge E3 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,length), gp_Pnt(r,0,length));
00070   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire wm(Ec,E1,E2,E3);
00071   if ( wm.IsDone() ) {
00072     TopoDS_Wire w = wm.Wire();
00073     if ( w.Closed() ) {
00074       BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace f(w);
00075       if (f.IsDone()) {
00076         profile = f.Face();
00077         valid = true;
00078         shape = BALLNOSE;
00079       }
00080     }
00081   }
00082 }
